outputs.output_descr:
The project intends to produce two sets of overall outputs. The first relates to capacity development of the PSD and the second one relates to the support for the implementation of key strategic activities.
Component one has the following outputs: (i) to reinforce core operational capacities of the PSD by providing the necessary human and financial resources and to strengthen key aspects of PSD's financial and personnel management, (ii) capacity for strategic planning, programming and coordination to guarantee better  implemen-tation of its activities.  The second component relates to (iii) the effective implementation of the African Peace and Security Agenda, (iv) enhancing the Common African defense and Security including the strengthening of the regional and Continental mechanisms for the control of small arms and light weapons. (v)  Enhancing coherence of the funding mechanism for the AU Peace and Security Agenda

project_title: Support for the Impl.  Peace & Security Agenda - AUC
